text: Country calling code: +64 International call prefix: 00 Trunk prefix: 0 New Zealand's telephone numbering plan divides the country into a large number of local calling areas. When dialling, if you wish to call a person in another local calling area, you must dial the trunk prefix followed by the area code. Below is a list of New Zealand local calling areas. ==Area code 3== {| class="wikitable" |- !Local Calling Area Name !Included Towns !Numbers begin with |- |Akaroa |Akaroa |304 |- yoza | Alexandra ||
